CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1962, pg. 10 reads: " "Mrs. John Wesley" - Mrs. Louise Jones (seated front), in royal regalia, won the title of "Mrs. John Wesley, " by reporting the top amount as an individual member at the Frappe Sip, which was a recent total church promotion. The general chairman, Mrs. Myrtle Glover (left), and Mrs. Marie Robinson, the runner-up, participated in coronation, which was conducted by the pastor, the Rev. H. W. McCreary III.  See other pictures next week.  With this title, Mrs. Jones may have free admission to all church events for a year. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lena Davis and Myrtle Glover holding plaque inscribed "Certificate of Recognition...," standing behind rectangular table with cake, trophy, cape, and scepter, in Wesley Center AME Church
